trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when attempting to apply an operator to incompatible operands when you evaluate a rule.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試評估規則時，將運算子套用到不相容運算元時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>與指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the message parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>使用訊息參數的新執行個體的屬性。</xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 Exception 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the error message to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含與這個執行個體產生關聯的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: serializeInfo is a null reference (Visual Basic ).
trans-unit.target: serializeInfo為 null 參考 (Visual Basic )。

trans-unit.source: The class name is a null reference (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) or the <xref:System.Exception.HResult*> is zero.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱為 null 參考 (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>) 或<xref:System.Exception.HResult*>為零。</xref:System.Exception.HResult*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of this <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>使用指定的錯誤訊息以及<xref:System.Exception>造成此<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>的</xref:System.Exception>內部參考類別

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>前一次的直接結果擲回<xref:System.Exception>應該包含在先前的例外狀況的參考<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述目前例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>造成目前例外狀況的執行個體。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>類別相容性違規的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個類別所代表之 Exception 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|引數的值`message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|引數的值`left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|引數的值`op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|引數的值`right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: 描述目前<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>的訊息

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>出現在運算子的左半部。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref>代表其相容性違規的運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>出現在運算子的右邊。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>類別相容性違規的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: This includes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: 這包括<xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個類別所代表之 Exception 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The value of the argument `ex.`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|引數的值`ex.`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|引數的值`message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|引數的值`left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|引數的值`op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|引數的值`right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: 描述目前<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>的訊息

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>出現在運算子的左半部。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref>代表其相容性違規的運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>出現在運算子的右邊。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>造成目前例外狀況的執行個體。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>例外狀況的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>所有<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException>物件序列化的資料。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During de-serialization, this exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化時，此例外狀況重新組成從<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>資料流上傳輸。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Type>造成例外狀況的運算式，左邊引數。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>造成例外狀況的運算式，左邊引數。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref>代表造成例外狀況的運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref>代表造成例外狀況的運算子。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Type>造成例外狀況的運算式，右邊引數。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>造成例外狀況的運算式，右邊引數。</xref:System.Type>
